pullrequest.title: Add SetHeight method to HeightmapShape class

content.raw:
Yes, it is a matter of my current implementation; The updates takes place at two separate plugins; ModelPlugin and VisualPlugin \(not sure if there is a way around that .. I posted a question on Gazebo answers\).

Eventually, I would make sure both updates \(visual\+physics\) happen in sync.
content.html:
Yes, it is a matter of my current implementation; The updates takes place at two separate plugins; ModelPlugin and VisualPlugin (not sure if there is a way around that .. I posted a question on Gazebo answers).

Eventually, I would make sure both updates (visual+physics) happen in sync.
